segments.text: I'm looking at this kitchen, and my heart's racing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's drying a plate, but the sink behind her is flooding.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's pouring out; she could slip any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot's already in itâ€”please notice!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the boy on the stool; it's tipping backward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching into the cookie jar so high up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One wrong move and he'll crash down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's right there, could get hurt too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle's spreading fast; the floor's a hazard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes on the counter might fall in the chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks safe, but inside it's tense.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope nothing bad happens to these little ones.
segments.speaker: PAR
